torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered with skirren fur. [npc.Her] new fur is a little thin and soft around [npc.her] joints and is quite densely packed for added protection.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldSquirrel(skirren)], [npc.skinFullDescription]. I'm so floof.
torso.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] torso has [npc.a_femininity(true)] appearance, and is [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.skinFullDescription(true)]. Mmm soft.
